Description: Encase your hand in molten rock, striking with burning force.
Cause a spire of molten lava to erupt from the ground.
Create a shield of molten rock that absorbs damage and burns attackers.
Cause an earthquake that cracks open the ground, releasing bursts of fire.
Cover yourself in an armor of rock and flames, providing high defense and burning attackers.
Summon pillars of lava to rise and burn anything they touch.
Cause a stream of lava to flow in a directed path, burning everything in its wake.
Summon a small-scale volcanic eruption in a targeted area.
Create a fortress of molten rock that traps and burns enemies.
Turn the ground into a burning field of lava and fire.
Summon a golem made of lava and rock to fight for you.
Cause the ground to shatter, launching hot rock shards at enemies.
Release a wave of molten rock and ash that engulfs enemies.
Cover yourself in armor that radiates heat and emits flames during combat.
Create a crater filled with lava, trapping and burning enemies.
Cause a mountain of fire and rock to rise from the earth, burning everything around it.
Summon a massive rupture in the earth, spewing lava and fire.
Call forth a wave of magma to sweep across the battlefield.
Harness the flames of the earth's core to incinerate everything in an immense radius.
Summon a titan made of molten rock and fire to wreak havoc.
